workout.description: Increases your heart rate and improves the health of the cardiovascular system.
Combination of strength, technique, and mental focus, and is popular among fitness enthusiasts and competitive athletes alike.
Physical exercise that uses resistance to build and strengthen muscles, improve bone density, and prevent chronic diseases.
High-intensity exercise that involves explosive jumping movements to improve power, speed, and agility.
Increase flexibility, range of motion, and muscle control, and can help improve athletic performance, prevent injuries, and reduce muscle soreness.
Competitive strength sport that tests athletes' abilities to lift, carry, and move heavy objects.
